location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran], to Lieutenant William Bruce, at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran], to Lieutenant William Bruce, at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of two letters sent on 28 September and 13 November 1810 and informing that the instructions regarding Mr. Robbio were transmitted to the Acting Resident at Bushire.
